title: Terrifying moment motorcyclist crashes head-on into an oncoming biker on a blind bend
text:
This is the terrifying moment a motorcycle rider crashed into an oncoming vehicle on a blind curve.

The rider lost control of the speed of his bike and went out of his lane as he approached a tight curve.

The incident happened in Marilaque, in the Philippines on October 10 this year.

The rider lost control of the speed of his bike (red in centre) and went out of his lane as he approached a tight curve in Marilaque, in the Philippines

The third bike to come round the corner veers off the road and collides straight into the unsuspecting rider coming the other way. Pictured: just before the collision

Footage shows several bikes coming round the corner towards the vehicle on the winding road.

The third bike to come round then veers off the road and collides straight into the unsuspecting rider coming the other way.

Thankfully, the oncoming rider, who was also doing a riding vlog when it happened, was able to slow down which reduced damage to what would have been a nasty collision.

Thankfully, the oncoming rider, who was also doing a riding vlog when it happened, was able to slow down which reduced damage to what would have been a head-on collision. Pictured: the driver close-up after the incident

He said: 'Accidents would be avoided if everyone practiced defensive driving. Be responsible, as you also endanger others by being reckless.'

No one was seriously hurt in the incident.
description: The rider in Marilaque, in the Philippines, lost control of the speed of his bike and went out of his lane as he approached a tight curve. No one was seriously hurt in the incident.
